TEXT.TITLE: EPITOPE <EPTO> SETS THREE FOR ONE STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Epitope Inc said its board of directors has authorized a three-for-one common stock split for which shareholder approval is expected in the next two weeks. The company announced a two-for-one split last week, but said the board reconvened and agreed to change it to a three-for-one split. Epitope is involved in the production of monoclonal antibodies for diagnostic and therapeutic use in AIDS and other immunological diseases. Reuter
